sections.title: Section 1: Fundamental Rights
sections.description: This section outlines the fundamental rights and freedoms of all citizens.

sections.title: Section 2: The Executive
sections.description: This section defines the powers and responsibilities of the executive branch.

sections.title: Section 3: The Legislature
sections.description: This section establishes the structure and powers of the legislative branch.

sections.title: Section 4: The Judiciary
sections.description: This section creates the judicial branch and outlines its jurisdiction.
